notes: This file defines a minimal curriculum for curriculum-only mode. It intentionally includes only a handful of high-frequency English tokens for smoke tests and basic integration.

To expand this curriculum, add one JSON object per line with fields: token (string), role (e.g., 'core','domain','punctuation'), is_real_word (bool), frequency (integer or 0 if unknown), and optional notes. Keep each line valid JSON.

For production use, this curriculum should typically contain thousands to tens of thousands of tokens, including domain-specific vocabulary and symbols needed by your application. Update this file or provide an alternative manifest at deploy time with an appropriately sized token set.
Consumers that use this file SHOULD treat only entries with role='core' (or other non-'documentation' roles) as usable tokens, and MAY ignore entries with role='documentation' entirely.
